byline.original: By MUJIB MASHAL and JAWAD SUKHANYAR

headline.main: Afghan Bodyguards Targeted in Bombing Claimed by ISIS Affiliates

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The attack in Kabul, which left at least six people dead and a dozen wounded, was the latest example of the Islamic State ranging beyond its base in eastern Afghanistan....
lead_paragraph: The attack in Kabul, which left at least six people dead and a dozen wounded, was the latest example of the Islamic State ranging beyond its base in eastern Afghanistan.
